alert.note: Alert for Naguabo (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 08 at 12:08PM ADT until April 08 at 1:45PM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 PM AST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall as well as runoff is expected. * WHERE...Naguabo. * WHEN...Until 215 PM AST. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring.Particuallry flood prone areas along Rio Blanco. Streams continue to rise due to excess runoff from earlier rainfall. Low-water crossings are inundated with water and may not be passable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1105 AM AST, gauge reports indicated rivers and small streams running well above normal levels or out of its banks. Flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the warned area. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 3 inches are possible in the warned area. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
